About Us

Firecrest UK Ltd. are a family run business based in the East Midlands and provide a range of services designed helping businesses meet their legal obligations and protecting their employees and premises from the ravages of fire. Read more...

Our Services include

  • Fire Extinguishers
  • Fire Alarms
  • Fire Risk Assessment
  • Staff Fire Safety Training
  • Emergency Lighting Maintenance
  • Portable Appliance Testing

For all enquires, call us on 0800 9874 3343
